body_content.explanation: If an animal or a plant is semi-domesticated, it has been partly, but not completely brought under human control, for example to be used as food, to help with work, or to be kept as a pet:
examples: The swans are semi-domesticated, with many of them living in city parks.
The reindeer are not treated like horses because the former are semi-domesticated animals.
Many wild and semidomesticated edible plant species are consumed as food in this region.
